sqls.sql: select * from AT_INT_TDM_TESTTASKDENIAL where 1=1 <#if arch_flag_s??> and ARCH_FLAG_S=:arch_flag_s </#if> <#if dummy1_s??> and DUMMY1_S=:dummy1_s </#if> <#if dummy2_s??> and DUMMY2_S=:dummy2_s </#if> <#if dummy3_s??> and DUMMY3_S=:dummy3_s </#if> <#if dummy4_s??> and DUMMY4_S=:dummy4_s </#if> <#if dummy5_s??> and DUMMY5_S=:dummy5_s </#if> <#if id_s??> and ID_S=:id_s </#if> <#if mesbusinesscode_s??> and MESBUSINESSCODE_S=:mesbusinesscode_s </#if> <#if receive_time_t??> and RECEIVE_TIME_T=:receive_time_t </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if refusereason_s??> and REFUSEREASON_S=:refusereason_s </#if> <#if samplebatch_s??> and SAMPLEBATCH_S=:samplebatch_s </#if> <#if venderbatch_s??> and VENDERBATCH_S=:venderbatch_s </#if> <#if venderbatch_short_s??> and VENDERBATCH_SHORT_S=:venderbatch_short_s </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by atr_key desc </#if>
